description: Manage App Compliance Automation Tool reports.

commands.name: az acat onboard
commands.summary: Onboard given subscriptions to Microsoft.AppComplianceAutomation provider.
commands.syntax:
az acat onboard --subscription-ids
                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]

commands.name: az acat quick-evaluation
commands.summary: Trigger quick evaluation for the given subscriptions.
commands.syntax:
az acat quick-evaluation --resource-ids
                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]

commands.name: az acat trigger-evaluation
commands.summary: Trigger quick evaluation for the given subscriptions.
commands.syntax:
az acat trigger-evaluation --resource-ids
                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
